name: Monzilla
description:
This is a game in which you control the might monster Monzilla and help him destroy cities!

Aimed at providing an enjoyable gameplay, in this game, if you die then your blood drops will generate new Monzillas and they will assist you in destroying the city. The character which you are controlling is automatically changed when you die.

Game Updates: 

Added Pause Menu

Fixed Player Control not working in level 3

Added better transition when a city is destroyed
